import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeleteGreaseProductForm(_ref){let{productId,onDeleteProduct}=_ref;const[productData,setProductData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProduct=async()=>{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/grease/${productId}`);const data=await response.json();setProductData(data);};if(productId){fetchProduct();}},[productId]);const handleDelete=async()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this product?')){try{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/grease/${productId}`,{method:'DELETE'});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();alert(data.message||'Product deleted successfully!');onDeleteProduct();// Refresh products after deletion
}else{const data=await response.json();alert(data.error||'Failed to delete product');}}catch(error){alert('An error occurred while deleting the product');}}};if(!productData)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Delete Product: ",productData.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Are you sure you want to delete this product?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Category:"})," ",productData.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price:"})," $",productData.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Stock:"})," ",productData.stock]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Offer:"})," ",productData.offer?'Yes':'No']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:productData.image,alt:productData.name,width:"100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete Product"})]});}export default DeleteGreaseProductForm;
